GSD.notes: When using the static builds from either the automatic updating process (built-in to VoIPmonitor GUI) or official downloads section, the binary can be easily abused for remote code execution. Otherwise, if you compile your own binaries, it will likely lead to DoS.
GSD.description: In VoIPmonitor VoIPmonitor sniffer version 27.5 a Buffer Overflow exists in the live sniffer feature that can be attacked via SIP resulting in RCE, DoS.

OSV.summary: Buffer Overflow in VoIPmonitor sniffer version 27.5
OSV.details: In VoIPmonitor VoIPmonitor sniffer version 27.5 a Buffer Overflow exists in the live sniffer feature that can be attacked via SIP resulting in RCE, DoS.
